Description:
Business Intelligence Analyst, S√£o Paulo - Cloudkitchens

Who We Are

CloudKitchens helps restaurateurs around the world succeed in online food delivery - our goal is to make food more affordable, higher quality, and convenient for everyone.

We take underutilized properties and transform them into smart kitchens so they can better serve restaurateurs, customers, and the neighborhoods they‚Äôre in. Every time we launch a new facility we create jobs in that neighborhood, and we‚Äôre proud to provide a wide range of cuisines and options for healthy food at an affordable price.

We're changing the game for restaurateurs whether they‚Äôre entrepreneurs opening their first restaurant all the way through to your favorite global quick-service restaurant chains.

What You‚Äôll Do


Develop and maintain sales analytics reports and dashboards to provide actionable insights that support data-driven decision-making for the sales leaders
Build and maintain reports, dashboards, and visualization to track key performance metrics and drive business decisions using SQL, Looker, Tableau, or other BI solutions.
Proactively monitor the quality and integrity of supporting sales data and highlight improvement opportunities.
Perform deep dive analysis of operating metrics providing business insights to leadership by understanding the situation, developing a hypothesis, analyzing data, and reporting back findings/solutions.
Effectively communicate analysis results to business leaders for decision-making and prioritization
Work with business leaders on implementing sales activities as needed with some oversight.


What We‚Äôre Looking For


Great communication skills.
Advanced English.
Data Analytics
Project management experience preferred.
SQL & Python


Why join us


Growing market: You‚Äôll be focused on an $80 billion market that‚Äôs projected to reach at least $500 billion by 2030 in the US alone.
Changing the restaurant industry: You‚Äôll be part of a team that helps restaurants succeed in online food delivery.
Collaborative environment: You will receive support and guidance from experienced colleagues and managers, helping you to learn, grow and achieve your goals, and you‚Äôll work closely with other teams to ensure our customer‚Äôs success.


What Else You Need To Know

This role is based in our S√£o Paulo office location. We believe that people do their best work when they are together. As a company, we‚Äôre in the marketplace of ideas and innovation. When you‚Äôre constantly innovating, changing how an industry works, inventing new products and processes - and we are doing all these things - we believe we‚Äôre better as a team in-person. That‚Äôs why all of our teams (except for our field-based roles) are now working from one of our office locations 5 days a week. Looking forward to sharing more about a Career of Substance at Cloudkitchens.

Ready to join us as we serve those who serve others?

Title: Senior Data Analyst
Description:
About The Company

If you see technology as there to smooth your path in life, our team does too: Your Path, Our Journey.

We believe in people who transform their paths through technology. Technology that connects people who are good at what they do and which practices diversity to create and share those paths that we (as yet!) do not even know about. Our journey is in the smile of every talented person who brings revolution to the world from Brazil - whether with in-app transportation (99) or digital payments (99Pay).

To make life easier for millions of people every day, we are in the driving seat as part of DiDi Chuxing, the world's largest transport, and convenient platform. And so, we can say, with great pride, that we are pioneers in creating solutions, starting in Brazil, that grow in scale and have positive impacts in a range of other countries.

Whether creating projects from scratch or continually improving our solutions, we like challenges that give us butterflies, and that's why we work with intensity, at a fast pace, with respect, collaboration, and partnership. On this journey, we also create learning and strengthen ourselves in diversity as a fundamental aspect that makes us stand out for our growth day after day.

About The Team/role

Estamos procurando uma Analista S√™nior de Dados (GROWTH DATA) apaixonada e experiente, que se destaque em pensamento cr√≠tico. Nesta fun√ß√£o, voc√™ trabalhar√° com dados de ride-hailing para construir an√°lises e extrair insights que nos permitam compreender a fundo nossa base de passageiros do Brasil e melhorar a efici√™ncia das nossas campanhas de aquisi√ß√£o desses usu√°rios. Se voc√™ tem um esp√≠rito de startup e est√° sempre buscando criar valor, voc√™ seria √≥tima para esta equipe!

In this role, you'll be...


Construir an√°lises que nos permitam identificar oportunidades para melhorar a efici√™ncia de nossas campanhas de aquisi√ß√£o.
Entender a fundo o comportamento e a composi√ß√£o da nossa base de passageiros do Brasil.
Monitorar e reportar a qualidade e evolu√ß√£o das principais m√©tricas que descrevem nossos usu√°rios.
Acompanhar o LTV (lifetime value) dos usu√°rios, entendendo e explicitando os fatores que o impactam.



We're eager to be in touch because you have...


Demonstrar experi√™ncia na gest√£o e resolu√ß√£o de problemas complexos em ambientes din√¢micos.
Fortes habilidades e mentalidade anal√≠ticas.
Excelentes habilidades de comunica√ß√£o, tanto oral quanto escrita.
Capacidade de interagir e influenciar parceiros internos e externos.
Organiza√ß√£o, gest√£o do tempo e facilidade na tomada de decis√µes.
Ingl√™s intermedi√°rio.



You'll love working at DiDi because...

We create user value

We strive to always create valuable experiences for our users in everything we do. Our focus is to always innovate new experiences that are safe, pleasant and efficient.

We are data-driven

We are strong believers in making informed decisions, that‚Äôs why we are data-driven. We can better navigate the business landscape strategically by analyzing valuable metrics.

Win-win Collaboration

Success is a team sport. When we work to help our partners and colleagues win, we win, too. While keeping everyone's best interest at heart, we communicate with candor and execute with excellence in all we do.

We believe in integrity

Integrity is at the very core of our business. We are people who always want to do the right thing. Our intentions are sincere, we speak our minds and listen to each other.

Growth

We always strive to do better. That means venturing beyond our comfort zones, learning from our mistakes, and helping each other grow.

Diversity and Inclusion

Diversity is one of our biggest strengths. Our differences are what make us distinct. We respect each other and believe in equal opportunities for all.

Diversity & Inclusion

Diversity is not a vision of the future or something we wish to have one day, it is a non-negotiable value of who we are.

We practice inclusion, plurality, and respect. And we count on the governance of the Diversity Committee, which works together with HR, leadership and identity groups - 99Adapta, 99Afro, 99Cores, 99Mulheres, and 99Mam√£es. This part of our journey has been written, there remains a long road before us.

We reinforce that this position is open to everyone, including pregnant people and people with disabilities (PwD).
